content.question: For which sample size is it more likely that greater than <math alttext="70" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>70</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> percent of the sample voted in the recent election?

choices.label: They are equally likely, because the mean of the sampling distribution is the same for both sample sizes.

It is more likely for a sample size of <math alttext="200" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>200</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> people, because there is more variability in the sampling distribution for larger sample sizes.
